name: Hypeline Media
tag_list: perfomance-marketing, media-exchanges, media-relations, media-development, media-buying, audience-data-segmenting, affiliate-marketing, web-design, xml-feeds, third-party-ad-servers, rich-media, network-ad-trafficking, information-architecture
overview:
hypeline media is a full-service online media company, which basically means, it’s morphing into a true hybrid of part publisher, part ad agency. Whether it’s branding, performance marketing, every how starts with asking why. Then we match our skills to your goals to deliver the results you’re looking for, handling the media sales for over 140 high-traffic quality websites, mobile apps and mobile sites in select vertical markets.

hypeline media is a one-stop shop for online advertisers & agencies looking to build brand awareness through high impact ad units and rich media across targeted content categories. We assist in developing media and creative strategies, execute these plans with volume media buys, and traffic campaign delivery utilizing our advanced ad-serving technology.

hypeline media then delivers results, usually above and beyond advertiser expectations. As an ad rep firm (rather than an ad network) we then interpret these results to make each subsequent buy more effective. In addition, we specialize in developing customized marketing solutions for direct-response advertisers.
